thread.title: 'Legend' actor Alex Giannini dies at 52
thread.title_full: 'Legend' actor Alex Giannini dies at 52 - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: 'Legend' actor Alex Giannini dies at 52
text:
*London:* British actor Alex Giannini, who was last seen in the Tom Hardy-starrer "Legend", has died. He was 52.
Giannini was pronounced dead shortly before he was due to take to the stage in Plymouth for "Mack & Mabel" yesterday.
Officials said the show at the Theatre Royal was cancelled an hour before the curtain was due ... Â»
